snippet.textDisplay: Unfortunately this bright spark is not the exception within government structures.She is the rule, and a perfect example of how the ANC government appoints unqualified, incapable individuals to strategic and important positions purely on race. Zimbabwe, here we come! - 90% unemployment, illegal imports, starvation and hardship. The real tragedy is that there are still so many who hold Mugabe as a hero, and the ideal person to emulate. The gravy train rides on heavier than ever before...
